benchmark_details.name: MIMIC-IV-Ext-22MCTS (22 Million-Event Temporal Clinical Time-Series Dataset for Risk Prediction)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a time series clinical events dataset consisting of 22,588,586 clinical time series events with timestamps extracted from discharge summaries, aimed at improving clinical risk prediction modeling.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance clinical risk forecasting and provide a dataset for machine learning models in healthcare applications.

data.annotation: Annotations were conducted by clinical experts for event extraction.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of models fine-tuned on the dataset compared to baseline model performances.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate improved clinical prediction capabilities.
methodology.validation: Evaluation of model performance using validation datasets from healthcare tasks.
